safetyNotice.title: Beware of counterfeit parts
safetyNotice.content:
Some counterfeit and third-party power adapters and batteries may not be designed properly and could result in safety issues. To ensure you receive a genuine Echoo battery during a battery replacement, we recommend visiting an Echoo Authorised Service Provider. If you need a replacement adapter to charge your Echoo device, we recommend getting an Echoo power adapter.

Also non-genuine replacement displays may have compromised visual quality and may fail to work correctly. Echoo-certified screen repairs are performed by trusted experts who use genuine Echoo parts.
